Infused with the goodness of Turmeric, it heals damaged skin caused by sun exposure & revives your skin's natural glow. That's not all!  It comes with a lightweight and non-sticky texture that gets absorbed instantly without any greasy residue.
Mamaearth Vitamin C Daily Glow Sunscreen is also Made Safe certified, which means it contains no toxins or harmful chemicals.
